abstract: Oil prices touched a three-month low, sending stocks soaring, while the Fed decided to keep its key rate steady.
snippet: Oil prices touched a three-month low, sending stocks soaring, while the Fed decided to keep its key rate steady.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices touched a three-month low on Tuesday, the latest milestone in a steep reversal for commodity prices that sent stocks soaring and eased inflation concerns among investors and policy makers alike.

headline.main: Lower Oil Prices Ignite Big Rally; Dow Is Up by 331

byline.original: By Michael M. Grynbaum and Louis Uchitelle
